db:abstract.db:para: Enables you to manage the Windows DWM features.
This type was introduced in QtWinExtras 1.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The DwmFeatures type enables you to extend a glass frame into the client area, as well as to control the behavior of Aero Peek and Flip3D.

db:section.db:title: blurBehindEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Specifies whether the blur behind the window client area is enabled.

db:section.db:title: bottomGlassMargin : int
db:section.db:para: The bottom glass frame margin. The default value is 0.

db:section.db:title: excludedFromPeek : bool
db:section.db:para: Specifies whether the window is excluded from Aero Peek. The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: flip3DPolicy : QtWin::WindowFlip3DPolicy
db:section.db:para: The current Flip3D policy for the window.

db:section.db:title: leftGlassMargin : int
db:section.db:para: The left glass frame margin. The default value is 0.

db:section.db:title: peekDisallowed : bool
db:section.db:para: Set this value to true if you want to forbid Aero Peek when the user hovers the mouse over the window thumbnail. The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: rightGlassMargin : int
db:section.db:para: The right glass frame margin. The default value is 0.

db:section.db:title: topGlassMargin : int
db:section.db:para: The top glass frame margin. The default value is 0.
